channel.title: How to make a npc must need slayer level for it
channel.description: ok well i have a delta source. and i have slayer tower teleport with npcs in it. how do i make thoughs npcs have requirement slayer level for them? like example. if i go attack a abbysal demon it would say u need level 75 slayer to attack them. please help.

item.title: How to make a npc must need slayer level for it
item.dc:creator: @Darkning Darkning
item.description:
@Darkning wrote:

private boolean AttackNPC()

add

if (type == ####) //replace #### with monster id{ if (playerLevel[18] < ##)//replace with slayer level { sM("You must be level ## slayer or higher to attack this monster."); ResetAttackNPC(); return false; } }

Read full topic
